∀ {E : Set Chapter5.Real} (hE : E.Nonempty) (hbound : BddAbove E)
  (claim1 :
    ∀ (n : Nat),
      ExistsUnique fun m =>
        And (Set.instMembership.mem (upperBounds E) (instHDiv.hDiv m.cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1)).cast)
          (Not
            (Set.instMembership.mem (upperBounds E)
              (instHSub.hSub (instHDiv.hDiv m.cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1))
                  (instHDiv.hDiv 1 (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1))).cast))),
  (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n => instHDiv.hDiv 1 (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1)).IsCauchy →
    (∀ (n : Nat), Set.instMembership.mem (upperBounds E) (instHDiv.hDiv ⋯.choose.cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1)).cast) →
      (∀ (n : Nat),
          Not
            (Set.instMembership.mem (upperBounds E)
              (instHSub.hSub (fun n => instHDiv.hDiv ((fun n => ⋯.choose) n).cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1))
                  (fun n => instHDiv.hDiv 1 (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1)) n).cast)) →
        (∀ (N n : Nat),
            GE.ge n N →
              ∀ (n' : Nat),
                GE.ge n' N →
                  Rat.instLE.le
                    (abs
                      (instHSub.hSub (instHDiv.hDiv ⋯.choose.cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1))
                        (instHDiv.hDiv ⋯.choose.cast (instHAdd.hAdd n'.cast 1))))
                    (instHDiv.hDiv 1 (instHAdd.hAdd N.cast 1))) →
          (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n =>
                instHDiv.hDiv ((fun n => ⋯.choose) n).cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1)).IsCauchy →
            Eq (Chapter5.LIM fun n => instHDiv.hDiv ((fun n => ⋯.choose) n).cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1))
                (Chapter5.LIM
                  (instHSub.hSub (fun n => instHDiv.hDiv ((fun n => ⋯.choose) n).cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1)) fun n =>
                    instHDiv.hDiv 1 (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1))) →
              ∀ (x : Chapter5.Real),
                Set.instMembership.mem E x →
                  ∀ (n : Nat),
                    GE.ge ((fun n => instHDiv.hDiv ((fun n => ⋯.choose) n).cast (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast 1)) n).cast x

        Exists fun N =>
          And
            (Int.instLEInt.le
              (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n =>
                  instHDiv.hDiv (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))

                        instHDiv.hDiv (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                          (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)).n₀
                    N)
                  n →
                ∀ (m : Int),
                  Int.instLEInt.le
                      (Int.instMax.max
                        (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n =>
                            instHDiv.hDiv (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                              (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)).n₀
                        N)
                      m →
                    ε.Close
                      (if h :
                          Int.instLEInt.le
                            (Int.instMax.max
                              (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n =>
                                  instHDiv.hDiv (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                                    (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)).n₀

                              instHDiv.hDiv (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                                (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)).seq
                          n
                      else 0)
                      (if h :
                          Int.instLEInt.le
                            (Int.instMax.max
                              (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n =>
                                  instHDiv.hDiv (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                                    (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)).n₀
                              N)
                            m then
                        (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n =>
                              instHDiv.hDiv (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                                (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)).seq
                          m
                      else 0))) →
    { n₀ := 0,
        seq :=
          (Chapter5.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n =>
              instHMul.hMul (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                (Rat.instInv_mathlib.inv (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1))).seq,
        vanish := ⋯ }.IsCauchy

                      else 0))) →
    { n₀ := 0,
        seq :=

              (instHSub.hSub
                (fun n =>
                  instHMul.hMul (Rat.instIntCast.intCast (Classical.choose ⋯))
                    (Rat.instInv_mathlib.inv (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)))
                fun n => instHMul.hMul 1 (Rat.instInv_mathlib.inv (instHAdd.hAdd (Rat.instNatCast.natCast n) 1)))).seq,
        vanish := ⋯ }.IsCauchy
